institute.name: Aptech Computer Education Center
institute.location: 35/6 D5 Street, Thanh My Tay Ward, District 2, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

overview.description: Aptech Computer Education is a leading global IT training institute with over 35 years of excellence in computer education. We are committed to providing world-class IT education and training programs that prepare students for successful careers in the technology industry.
overview.mission: To empower individuals with cutting-edge IT skills and knowledge, enabling them to excel in the rapidly evolving technology landscape and contribute meaningfully to the digital transformation of society.
overview.vision: To be the world's most preferred IT education brand, recognized for innovation, quality, and excellence in preparing future-ready IT professionals.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We strive for the highest standards in education, training, and student outcomes.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We continuously evolve our curriculum and teaching methods to stay ahead of industry trends.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: We maintain the highest ethical standards in all our interactions and operations.

values.title: Student-Centric
values.description: We place our students at the center of everything we do, ensuring their success is our priority.

achievements.title: 35+ Years of Excellence
achievements.description: Over three decades of providing quality IT education worldwide

achievements.title: 40+ Countries
achievements.description: Global presence with training centers across multiple continents

achievements.title: 7 Million+ Students
achievements.description: Successfully trained millions of IT professionals globally

achievements.title: Industry Recognition
achievements.description: Certified by leading technology companies and educational bodies

departments.name: Software Engineering
departments.description: Comprehensive programs in software development, web technologies, and application design using cutting-edge programming languages and frameworks.
departments.head: Dr. Nguyen Van Minh

departments.name: Network & Security
departments.description: Specialized training in network administration, cybersecurity, cloud computing, and infrastructure management for enterprise environments.
departments.head: Mr. Tran Duc Huy

departments.name: Data Science & AI
departments.description: Advanced programs in data analytics, machine learning, artificial intelligence, and business intelligence for the modern data-driven world.
departments.head: Dr. Le Thi Mai

departments.name: Digital Design & Media
departments.description: Creative programs combining technology and design, covering multimedia, animation, UI/UX design, and digital marketing strategies.
departments.head: Ms. Pham Thi Lan

annualEvents.overview: Aptech organizes a comprehensive calendar of events throughout the academic year, designed to enhance learning, foster innovation, and build strong industry connections. Our events range from technical competitions to cultural celebrations, providing students with diverse opportunities for growth and networking.

categories.name: Academic & Technical Events
categories.description: Competitions, workshops, and seminars focused on technical skills and academic excellence

events.name: TechWiz Global Programming Championship
events.description: International programming competition where students showcase their coding skills and innovative solutions

events.name: Innovation & Project Showcase
events.description: Annual exhibition where students present their final year projects and innovative solutions

events.name: Tech Talk Series
events.description: Monthly seminars featuring industry experts sharing latest technology trends and career insights

categories.name: Career Development
categories.description: Events focused on career preparation, industry connections, and professional development

events.name: Career Fair & Industry Connect
events.description: Major recruitment event connecting students with leading IT companies and startups

events.name: Alumni Homecoming
events.description: Annual gathering of Aptech graduates sharing success stories and networking opportunities

events.name: Graduation Ceremony
events.description: Formal ceremony celebrating the achievements of graduating students

categories.name: Cultural & Community
categories.description: Events celebrating diversity, creativity, and community spirit within the Aptech family

events.name: Aptech Cultural Festival
events.description: Multi-cultural celebration featuring performances, food, and traditions from around the world

events.name: Sports & Wellness Week
events.description: Inter-department sports competitions and wellness activities promoting healthy lifestyle

events.name: Orientation Week
events.description: Welcome program for new students introducing them to Aptech culture and academic life
